pageContext.claim: “He was a Democrat -- he said, ‘We have 11 years.’ It's the first time I've heard it; I heard 12. But now, see, it's been a year, so now they think we have 11 years to live. I don't know, folks. I think these people have gone totally loco.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is oversimplifying. Some scientists say some effects from climate change may be irreversible in 11 years, not that life on Earth will soon end.
